Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest

Provides the classes necessary for communicating with RESTful web services.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AuthenticationStrategy Describes how web service requests are authenticated.
Deserializer<T> A Deserializer is used to convert web service responses into domain objects.
RestfulClient Provides an interface for communicating with a RESTful web service.
TokenGenerator TokenGenerator is responsible for generating shared secret tokens.
 

Class Summary
JsonDeserializer<T> Provides an API for deserializing JSON responses into domain model instances.
RestfulJsonTypeAdapter<T> Facilitates the mapping of Java data types to JSON.
RestfulMapper This abstract implementation of ObjectMapper provides methods to map domain models to RESTful web service resources.
RestfulModelMap Abstract implementation of ModelMap representing a domain model instance mapped to a RESTful web service resource.
RestfulPairsTypeAdapter<T> Facilitates the mapping of Java data types to RESTful web service name-value pair fields.
RestfulXmlTypeAdapter<T> Facilitates the mapping of Java data types to XML.
RestResponse Encapsulates an HTTP server response from a RESTful web service.
XmlDeserializer<T> Provides an API for deserializing XML responses into domain model instances.
 

Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest Description

Provides the classes necessary for communicating with RESTful web services.
